name: John K. BERRY, Sr., Administrator of the Estate of John K. Berry, Jr., Deceased and John K. Berry, Sr., in His Own Right, v. Cortland Orvel TITUS, Jr. and West Cain Township

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 95 E.D. Appeal Docket 1986.
